trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Olympia
There were no other sightings in Olympia on or around May 4th 2013
divs: sighting detailson the nights of may 3 & 4, 2013 while camping at millersylvania state park near tumwater wa. i and three others witnessed flyovers of unknown objects for over two hours; beginning at 9:30 pm and continuing until 11:45 pm. the sightings began with satellite like objects passing overhead, but traveling also in pairs and in groups of up to 6 objects. at times the objects passed over from multiple directions at once, in groups, and traveling in opposite directions as groups and single objects. the activity seemed to pick up a pace of sorts as the sighting went on to include "dark" "shadowy" craft that suddenly seemed to appear, take flight in long aching curves of varied speeds and heights. then the objects would flash so bright as to cast shadows around us.at one point the man with me commented that he didn't think 5 minutes had gone by without an object overhead, flashing at us and returning signals that i started to send back with very good lights. at one point, a square or cube shaped object appeared, elongated into a rectangle with a textured bottom of black and white "spots" that then became just white spaces moving across the black surface one after another. white space, black space moving like a conveyor belt. and then the surface appeared speckled brilliant white and jet black, pulsating that way and then disappeared. what i have started to call "blinkers". objects that seem to both "drop" in from above, fly in on an arch shaped path, suddenly just brighten and flash several times. these objects also seem to pass over again and again to signaling we initiated. there was also reported "feelings" and "intuitive" interaction in that a "feeling" would occur directly before a large display of light and motion. multiple objects traveling in different directions that flashed as they passed overhead. through binoculars the objects appear varied in colors, but mostly oranges, blacks, yellows, intense silver\whites both in surfaces and flashes with black centers that "radiate"the light from the objects surfaces. the light also radiates as spirals at given times.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: multiples of objects, traveling various directions around mt. rainier & locale. flashing, blinking, descending, speed & directional changes. textured surface flashing
